short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily organize links into hypurlinks that can be accessed using shortcuts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your web navigation like never before with Hypurlink! This handy extension lets you bundle multiple links, making your browsing experience more efficient and organized.

Key Features:
1. Group related links: Easily bundle multiple links in one hypurlink. No more searching through your bookmarks or tabs to find the right link.
2. Easily access your links using shortcuts: Effortlessly reopen saved links, ensuring peace of mind when closing your browser.
3. Share your links: Share with friends and colleagues. No more copy pasting links or sending multiple messages.

Download now and take control of your browsing!
